ISSUE.TITLE: Sveltekit guide still uses the old packages
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link https://supabase.com/docs/guides/getting-started/tutorials/with-sveltekit ## Describe the problem This guide is great, but it is using the old version of the auth helper package. It should use the new ``@supabase/ssr`` package instead. ## Describe the improvement Edit the guide to make it compatible with the new package. ## Additional context This issue has been reported on the Discord by olegpolin.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: chore: update cli reference doc (#22102) * chore: update cli reference doc * chore: update cli reference doc
